mapper.select: select * from sys_dictionary_item i where exists (select * from sys_dictionary t where 1 = 1 and dictionary_name = '附件' and i.fk_dictionary_uuid = t.uuid) and i.IS_ENABLED = '1' and item_name like '%${ITEM_NAME}%' and item_code = #{ITEM_CODE} order by i.item_code
select t.item_code,t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.uuid=#{attachment_uuid}

select t.bu_atta_uuid,t.business_name,t.attachment_name,t.fuctiontype,t.describe,b.dic_type, (select s.ITEM_NAME from sys_dictionary_item s where t.servicecode = s.item_code) service_name from sys_business_attachment t,sync_business_model b where 1=1 and t.attachment_name like '%${attachment_name}%' and t.business_id=b.id and t.business_name='${business_name}' and b.dic_type='${business_type}' order by t.fuctiontype
select i.uuid,i.item_name,i.item_code from sys_dictionary t , sys_dictionary_item i where 1 = 1 and t.dictionary_code = #{code} and i.fk_dictionary_uuid = t.uuid order by i.item_code
select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.uuid=#{attachment_uuid}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_business_attachment t where t.bu_atta_uuid =#{uuid}
mapper.select: select i.uuid, i.item_name from sys_dictionary_item i where i.item_code like '03%' and i.is_enabled = '1' and exists( select * from sys_business_attachment r where i.uuid = r.attachment_uuid and r.state='1' and r.fuctiontype='${fuctionType}' and exists( select * from sync_business_model b where r.business_id=b.id and b.key in (${projectTypes}) and b.dic_type='${dicTypes}' and b.state='1' ) )
